OLEV Documents

Thanks

Almost there! To complete your order please fill in some additional detail about your installation. This information will help us determine whether you qualify for a standard installation.

OLEV Application Form Annex D

Please fill out this form to complete your OLEV application. Note your installation date can not be scheduled until your OLEV application has been processed.

Who owns your vehicle?

Proof of vehicle ownership

Please upload a copy of your vehicle order confirmation. This is required as additional documentation for the OLEV grant as proof of vehicle purchase.

Electricity Meter Point Number

Please enter your MPAN (Meter Point Administration Number). This should be printed in the format below on a recent electricity bill. The bottom row of numbers are required, in addition to your electricity bill, they can also be found online here.

S
Finish

Questions

Why do you require so much information for the grant claim?

The Office for Low Emission Vehicles are seeking to reduce the risk of fraudulent activity and ensure value for money when spending public funds. They require enough evidence to demonstrate that a cost has been incurred and paid at market value in order to pay the grant back to Pod Point in arrears.

How long will it take to process the OLEV grant?

It will take approximately X-X days to process your OLEV grant. Once you are approved for the grant, Pod Point will be in touch to schedule your installation date. If at this point you do not qualify for the grant, you can avail of a full refund or opt to pay the additional £500 for the chargepoint.

Do I need to be at home for my scheduled installation date?

Yes, we recommend that you are at home for the duration of the installation. No domestic install is exactly the same so it's hard to give an exact time. However, we estimate 1.5-3 hours for a standard installation. At the end of the installation your POD Point Expert will give you a demonstration of the unit and confirm you're happy with everything so it's important that you are there at the time.
